title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: Your Privacy is Our Priority

intro.first: At Impact Tech, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data when you visit our website or use our services.
intro.second: We comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

items.subtitle: 1.1 Personal Information
items.text: When you contact us or use our services, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, company name, and project requirements. This information is provided voluntarily by you.

items.subtitle: 1.2 Technical Information
items.text: We automatically collect certain technical information when you visit our website, including your IP address, browser type, device information, operating system, referring URLs, and pages visited. This data helps us improve our website performance and user experience.

items.subtitle: 1.3 Cookies and Tracking
items.text: Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and understand user preferences. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

items.subtitle: 2.1 Service Delivery
items.text: We use your personal information to provide our web development, mobile app development, and software services. This includes communicating with you about projects, sending quotes, and delivering completed work.

items.subtitle: 2.2 Communication
items.text: Your contact information allows us to respond to inquiries, provide customer support, send service updates, and share relevant information about our services that may interest you.

items.subtitle: 2.3 Website Improvement
items.text: Technical data helps us analyze website usage patterns, identify issues, optimize performance, and improve our services and user interface based on user behavior and feedback.

items.subtitle: 2.4 Legal Compliance
items.text: We may use your information to comply with applicable laws, regulations, legal processes, or governmental requests, and to protect our rights and interests.

items.subtitle: 3.1 Security Measures
items.text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. This includes encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits.

items.subtitle: 3.2 Data Storage
items.text: Your data is stored on secure servers located in the European Union, complying with GDPR regulations. We retain your information only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law.

items.subtitle: 3.3 Access Control
items.text: Access to your personal information is restricted to authorized personnel who need it to perform their job functions. All staff members are trained on data protection principles and confidentiality requirements.

items.subtitle: 4.1 Third-Party Services
items.text: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business, or servicing you. These parties are contractually obligated to keep your information confidential and use it only for specified purposes.

items.subtitle: 4.2 Business Transfers
items.text: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your personal information may be transferred to the acquiring entity. We will notify you of any such change and provide options regarding your data.

items.subtitle: 4.3 Legal Requirements
items.text: We may disclose your information when required by law, court order, or governmental regulation, or when we believe disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, your safety, or the safety of others.

items.subtitle: 4.4 No Selling of Data
items.text: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes. Your data is used solely for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy.

items.subtitle: 5.1 Right to Access
items.text: You have the right to request access to the personal information we hold about you. We will provide a copy of your data in a structured, commonly used format within 30 days of your request.

items.subtitle: 5.2 Right to Rectification
items.text: If you believe any information we hold about you is inaccurate or incomplete, you have the right to request correction or completion of that information.

items.subtitle: 5.3 Right to Erasure
items.text: You can request deletion of your personal information ("right to be forgotten") under certain circumstances, such as when the data is no longer necessary for the purposes for which it was collected.

items.subtitle: 5.4 Right to Object
items.text: You have the right to object to processing of your personal information for direct marketing purposes or when processing is based on legitimate interests.

items.subtitle: 5.5 Right to Data Portability
items.text: You can request to receive your personal data in a portable format and have it transmitted to another data controller where technically feasible.

items.subtitle: 5.6 Right to Withdraw Consent
items.text: Where processing is based on your consent, you have the right to withdraw that consent at any time without affecting the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal.

items.subtitle: 6.1 EU Data Protection
items.text: As a company based in Greece (EU), we comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). When transferring data outside the EU, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place.

items.subtitle: 6.2 Transfer Mechanisms
items.text: Any international data transfers are conducted using approved mechanisms such as Standard Contractual Clauses, adequacy decisions, or other legally compliant methods to protect your data.

items.subtitle: 7.1 Marketing Communications
items.text: If you have opted in to receive marketing communications, you can unsubscribe at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in our emails or contacting us directly.

items.subtitle: 7.2 Service Communications
items.text: We may send you essential service-related communications (such as project updates, security alerts, or policy changes) which you cannot opt out of as they are necessary for service delivery.

items.subtitle: 8.1 Policy Updates
items.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, technology, legal requirements, or other factors. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website with a new "Last Updated" date.

items.subtitle: 8.2 Continued Use
items.text: Your continued use of our website and services after any changes to this Privacy Policy constitutes your acceptance of the revised policy.
